glossary.name: Today is the last day at school.
glossary.text: Hari ini hari terakhir masuk sekolah.

glossary.name: Yeay, I'm going to meet grandma. And go to the zoo with her.
glossary.text: Asik, aku akan bertemu nenek. Dan pergi ke kebun binatang bersamanya.

glossary.name: Ok, you go take a shower first, your body smells bad after school.
glossary.text: Yaudah kamu pergi mandi dulu, badanmu bau sepulang sekolah.

glossary.name: I feel so fresh after shower.
glossary.text: Segar sekali setelah mandi.

glossary.name: After taking a shower, you open the wardrobe.
glossary.text: Setelah mandi, kamu membuka lemari pakaian.

glossary.name: Where is my favorite clothe?
glossary.text: Dimana ya baju favoritku?

glossary.name: It is on the top of wardrobe..
glossary.text: Ternyata ada di paling atas lemari.

glossary.name: You try to take your clothe.
glossary.text: Kamu berusaha mengambil bajumu.

glossary.name: I can’t reach it because is too high. I need a help.
glossary.text: Aku tidak sampai untuk mengambilnya karena terlalu tinggi. Aku butuh bantuan.

glossary.name: You come to mom.
glossary.text: Kamu pergi menghampiri ibu.

glossary.name: Mom!
glossary.text: Ibu!

glossary.name: What's happened?
glossary.text: Ada apa nak?

glossary.name: I want to take the clothe in the wardrobe.
glossary.text: Aku mau mengambil baju di lemari.

glossary.name: What's wrong with the clothe?
glossary.text: Ada apa dengan bajunya?

glossary.name: It's on the top of wardrobe, i can’t get it, the wardrobe is too high.
glossary.text: Itu ada di lemari yang paling atas, aku tidak sampai untuk mengambilnya, lemarinya terlalu tinggi.

glossary.name: Ok, I will take it.
glossary.text: Baiklah, akan ibu ambilkan.

glossary.name: Nothing.
glossary.text: Tidak ada apa-apa ibu.

glossary.name: Why are you still wearing towel?
glossary.text: Lalu kenapa kamu masih memakai handuk?

glossary.name: Ahh, I want to get clothe in the wardrobe.
glossary.text: Ahh, aku mau mengambil baju di lemari.

glossary.name: Is the dinner ready, mom?
glossary.text: Apakah makan malamnya sudah siap?

glossary.name: It will be ready soon, but before that, wear your clothe.
glossary.text: Sebentar lagi siap, tapi sebelum itu, pakai bajumu terlebih dahulu.

glossary.name: Which clothe do you want to wear?
glossary.text: Baju mana yang mau kamu pakai?

glossary.name: That clothe mom, the black one.
glossary.text: Baju yang itu bu, yang warna hitam.

glossary.name: Here it is.
glossary.text: Ini bajunya.

glossary.name: Thank you so much mom.
glossary.text: Terimakasih banyak ibu.

glossary.name: You’re welcome.
glossary.text: Sama-sama.

glossary.name: After getting dressed, go to the kitchen, we will have dinner.
glossary.text: Setelah selesai pakai baju, segera ke dapur, kita akan makan malam.

glossary.name: Ok mom.
glossary.text: Baik ibu.

glossary.name: You quickly put on your clothe and go to the kitchen for dinner.
glossary.text: Kamu segera memakai baju dan pergi ke dapur untuk makan malam.

glossary.name: What are you cooking tonight mom?
glossary.text: Masak apa ibu malam ini?

glossary.name: Mom cooks your favorite chicken soup, sit down.
glossary.text: Ibu masak sup ayam kesukaanmu, ayo duduk.

glossary.name: Yeayy. I will eat chicken soup right now.
glossary.text: Wahh asik. Aku akan langsung makan sup ayamnya.

glossary.name: It's okay, but I will ask permission to take holiday.
glossary.text: Boleh-boleh saja, tapi ayah akan meminta ijin untuk mengambil cuti.

glossary.name: What’s wrong [name]?
glossary.text: Kenapa [Players Name]?

glossary.name: It’s too hot!
glossary.text: Ini terlalu panas!

glossary.name: Eat it slowly, blow it first, wait until cool.
glossary.text: Pelan-pelan dong makan nya, di tiup dulu, tunggu agak dingin.

glossary.name: Don’t be in a hurry.
glossary.text: Jangan terburu-buru.

glossary.name: Ok mom, dad.
glossary.text: Baik bu, yah.

glossary.name: After you finish eating, you go back to your room and get ready for sleeping.
glossary.text: Setelah selesai makan, kamu kembali ke kamar untuk bersiap-siap tidur.

glossary.name: It's 9 pm, it's time to sleep.
glossary.text: Sudah jam 9 malam, saatnya aku tidur.

glossary.name: It's too cold tonight, i have to use my blanket, so i don't get cold.
glossary.text: Malam ini lumayan dingin, aku harus memakai selimut, biar tidak kedinginan.

glossary.name: You turn off the light, and go to sleep.
glossary.text: Kamu mematikan lampu, dan pergi tidur.

glossary.name: Good night.
glossary.text: Selamat malam.

glossary.name: Morning world!
glossary.text: Pagi dunia!

glossary.name: Before that I have to take a shower first.
glossary.text: sebelum itu aku harus mandi dulu.

glossary.name: Oh how fresh it is!
glossary.text: Ahh Segarnya!

glossary.name: After taking shower, you get dressed quickly and go to the kitchen.
glossary.text: Setelah selesai mandi, kamu bergegas memakai baju dan pergi ke dapur.

glossary.name: Good morning mom.
glossary.text: Selamat pagi ibu.

glossary.name: Good morning [Players Name]
glossary.text: Selamat pagi [Players Name]

glossary.name: You're so excited this morning, what’s happened?
glossary.text: Semangat sekali kamu pagi ini, ada apa?

glossary.name: Because today is holiday, i will help mom take care of the house work.
glossary.text: Karena hari ini aku libur, aku akan membantu ibu mengurus pekerjaan rumah.

glossary.name: Because today is a holiday
glossary.text: Karena hari ini libur, aku akan membantu ibu mengerjakan tugas rumah.

glossary.name: Dad, Mom, I'm Home!
glossary.text: Ayah, Ibu, Aku pulang!

glossary.name: Holiday has come. I can't wait to visit grandma's house
glossary.text: Liburan telah tiba. Aku tidak sabar pergi ke rumah nenek..

glossary.name: Finally, we have passed the final exam. Happy holidays!
glossary.text: Akhirnya, ujian akhir sudah kita lewati. Selamat berlibur!

glossary.name: Welcome, Why do you look
glossary.text: Selamat datang, Kenapa kamu terlihat senang sekali ?

glossary.name: You go home with a happy face.
glossary.text: Kamu pulang dengan wajah senang.

glossary.name: Wow, a great idea. Dad, What do you think?
glossary.text: Wah, ide yang bagus. Bagaimana menurut ayah?

glossary.name: I want to visit grandma's house
glossary.text: Aku ingin mengunjungi rumah nenek.

glossary.name: Wow, it's a holiday, where do you want to go?
glossary.text: Wah, sudah liburan ya, kamu ingin kemana?

glossary.name: You go to your room and take a shower.
glossary.text: Kamu pergi ke kamar mu dan mandi.

glossary.name: Yes, mom.
glossary.text: Baik bu.
